description: Read and edit data from Microsoft 365 when accessing from the Microsoft Purview portal.
richDescription:
Assign the Purview Workload Content Writer role to users who need to do the following tasks:
- Read and edit Microsoft 365 data (such as SharePoint, Teams, OneDrive, or Exchange) when accessing from the Microsoft Purview portal
To assign this role, you must use the Microsoft Purview portal. If you try to assign this role using the Microsoft Entra admin center, it might be overwritten.
